content: Tell me a joke about space or technology.

Sure! Here's one: 

Why don't scientists trust atoms?

Because they make up everything! 

But if you're looking for something more space or technology-oriented, how about this one:

Why did the programmer quit his job?

Because he didn't get arrays! 

Okay, maybe that one was a bit too nerdy. How about this space joke:

Why don't astronauts play hide and seek?

Because good luck hiding in space! 

Hope those made you smile!
